title: Seeing the girl
description: Seeing the girl is the story of three women who live inside one another's lives - dangerously. Janaki is poised to enter into a conventional 'arranged marriage' when unanticipated events break out.Janaki narrates the dark and intricate story of her family, pausing to let Amma and Leela too interweave their versions of the truth.Seeing the girl was long listed for the 2007 Man Asian Literary prize, while it was a manuscript.
author: Anuradha Vijayakrishnan
